title: The King: Henry V on film
itunes:title: The King: Henry V on film
itunes:subtitle: Historian and author Lauren Johnson discusses the history behind the new Netflix film The King, considering how closely it follows Shakespeare’s plays and the real events of Henry V’s life and reign. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Lauren Johnson discusses the history behind the new Netflix film The King, considering how closely it follows the real events of Henry V’s life and reign. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
